0.0: I make pleasant songs, and weave verses; Because for You my soul longs.
0.1: My soul desires to be in Your handâ€™s shade; To know all of Your deepest mystery.
0.2: When I speak of Your Glory; My heart yearns for Your love.
0.3: Therefore I will speak of Your Glories; And Your Name I will glorify in songs of love.
0.4: I will recount Your Glory, though I have not seen You; I describe You though I have not known You.
0.5: In Your prophet's writings, in Your servants' speech; You depicted the beauty of Your glorious splendor.
0.6: Your greatness and might; They portrayed in accordance with Your actions.
0.7: They depicted you, though You are not as they depicted; They characterized you according to Your doings.
0.8: They allegorized you in many visions; Behold, You are one in all depictions.
0.9: They saw in You old age and youth; They represented Your hair as both whitened and black.
0.10: Old age on the day of judgment, youth on the day of battle; Like a man of war who has many talents.
0.11: He wore the helmet of redemption on His head; His right arm and holy left arm brought redemption.
0.13: He beautifies Himself through me, because He desires me; And He shall be for me a crown of beauty.
0.14: His head is like pure gold; On His forehead is inscribed His honored holy name.
0.16: The place of justice, His splendid beauty; May He elevate it above his greatest joy.
0.18: His splendor is on me, and my splendor is on Him; He is close to me when I call to him.
0.20: May you nod your head to my blessing; May you accept it like the finest spices.
0.21: May my contemplation be sweet to You, For my soul yearns for You.
